new materials.sentence: We have developed a modular new strategy to access a diverse range of peptide macrocycles with well-defined conformations.

screening algorithms.sentence: The document does not mention any new high-throughput or large-scale screening algorithm, methods or workflow.

experimental methodology.sentence:
To circumvent the formation of cyclodimers and polymers, high dilution conditions are often required, which may result in long reaction times and large amounts of solvent waste. To stabilize the macrocyclization precursor conformations, we have reported reactions that are facilitated by ion pairing between the termini of the linear input.

The document mentions a novel experimental methodology used in the form of "PBM reaction" (phosphonium-assisted macrocyclization) to yield a variety of peptide macrocycles.
